sentence: WASHINGTON Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., was cited Tuesday for having a loaded 9mm handgun at a TSA checkpoint at Charlotte Douglas International Airport, the second time he has been stopped with a firearm at an airport since taking office last year.
title: Rep. Madison Cawthorn cited for having a gun at Charlotte airport

sentence: This is the second time a gun has been found on Cawthorn at an airport: The Transportation Security Administration discovered a 9mm handgun in his carry-on bag at Asheville Regional Airport in February 2021. Virtually every Monday or Tuesday we start the week out with another embarrassing headline from Madison Cawthorn .

title: Madison Cawthorn Cited For Carrying Gun At Charlotte Airport

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., was cited for being in possession of a firearm at Charlotte Douglas International Airport on Tuesday morning, according to multiple local media reports.

title: North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn cited for having gun at Charlotte airport: reports

sentence: Officers cited Rep. Madison Cawthorn on Tuesday for carrying a loaded gun inside of Charlotte Douglas International Airport, the latest in a string of controversies Cawthorn has found himself in.

title: Madison Cawthorn is cited for bringing a loaded gun into the Charlotte Airport

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn was cited Tuesday for possession of a dangerous weapon on city property after a gun was discovered in his bag at a security screening checkpoint in Charlotte Douglas International Airport in North Carolina.
